1: וַיַּ֗עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> נָחָשׁ֙ <sup>5176 </sup> <n>Then Nahash</n> הָֽעַמּוֹנִ֔י <sup>5984 </sup> <n>the Ammonite</n> וַיִּ֖חַן <sup>2583 </sup> <n>and encamped</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>of</n> יָבֵ֣שׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n> גִּלְעָ֑ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> יָבֵישׁ֙ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נָחָ֔שׁ <sup>5176 </sup> <n>unto Nahash</n> כְּרָת־ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>Make</n> לָ֥נוּ בְרִ֖ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>with us and we will serve</n>
2: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>answered</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>But</n> נָחָשׁ֙ <sup>5176 </sup> <n>And Nahash</n> הָעַמּוֹנִ֔י <sup>5984 </sup> <n>the Ammonite</n> בְּזֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>them On this</n> אֶכְרֹ֣ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>[condition] will I make</n> לָכֶ֔ם בִּנְק֥וֹר <sup>5365 </sup> <n>[a covenant] with you that I may thrust out</n> לָכֶ֖ם כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> עֵ֣ין <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eyes</n> יָמִ֑ין <sup>3225 </sup> <n>all your right</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֥יהָ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and lay</n> חֶרְפָּ֖ה <sup>2781 </sup> <n>it [for] a reproach</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>one</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>upon all Israel</n>
3: וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלָ֜יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> זִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>And the elders</n> יָבֵ֗ישׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n> הֶ֤רֶף <sup>7503 </sup> <n>respite</n> לָ֙נוּ֙ שִׁבְעַ֣ת <sup>7651 </sup> <n>unto him Give us seven</n> יָמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days'</n> וְנִשְׁלְחָה֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>that we may send</n> מַלְאָכִ֔ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>messengers</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>throughout</n> גְּב֣וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>unto all the coasts</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מוֹשִׁ֛יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and then if [there be] no man to save</n> אֹתָ֖נוּ <sup>853 </sup> וְיָצָ֥אנוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>us we will come out</n> אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
4: וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Then came</n> הַמַּלְאָכִים֙ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>the messengers</n> גִּבְעַ֣ת <sup>1390 </sup> <n>to Gibeah</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>of Saul</n> וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and told</n> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the tidings</n> בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <sup>241 </sup> <n>in the ears</n> הָעָ֑ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> וַיִּשְׂא֧וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>lifted up</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֛ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קוֹלָ֖ם <sup>6963 </sup> <n>their voices</n> וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n>
5: וְהִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>now behold</n> שָׁא֗וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And behold Saul</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחֲרֵ֤י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> הַבָּקָר֙ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>the herd</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>out of the field</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>and Saul</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> לָּעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>What [aileth] the people</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יִבְכּ֑וּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>that they weep</n> וַיְסַ֨פְּרוּ־ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>? And they told</n> ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דִּבְרֵ֖י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>him the tidings</n> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>582 </sup> <n>of the men</n> יָבֵֽישׁ׃ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n>
6: וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>came</n> רֽוּחַ־ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>And the Spirit</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>upon Saul</n> [בְּשָׁמְעֹו כ] (כְּשָׁמְעֹ֖ו <sup>8085 </sup> <n>listen</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>those tidings</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וַיִּ֥חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>was kindled</n> אַפּ֖וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>and his anger</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n>
7: וַיִּקַּח֩ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And he took</n> צֶ֨מֶד <sup>6776 </sup> <n>a yoke</n> בָּקָ֜ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of oxen</n> וַֽיְנַתְּחֵ֗הוּ <sup>5408 </sup> <n>and hewed them in pieces</n> וַיְשַׁלַּ֞ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>throughout</n> גְּב֣וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>[them] throughout all the coasts</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בְּיַ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by the hands</n> הַמַּלְאָכִ֣ים ׀ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>of messengers</n> לֵאמֹר֒ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whoever</n> אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>does not</n> יֹצֵ֜א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Whosoever cometh not forth</n> אַחֲרֵ֤י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> וְאַחַ֣ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>and after</n> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <sup>8050 </sup> <n>Samuel</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>so</n> יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so shall it be done</n> לִבְקָר֑וֹ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>unto his oxen</n> וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fell</n> פַּֽחַד־ <sup>6343 </sup> <n>And the fear</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>on the people</n> וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and they came out</n> כְּאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>consent</n> אֶחָֽד׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>with one</n>
8: וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>And when he numbered</n> בְּבָ֑זֶק <sup>966 </sup> <n>them in Bezek</n> וַיִּהְי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>were three</n> מֵא֣וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אֶ֔לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and the men</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>thirty</n> אָֽלֶף׃ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n>
9: וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> לַמַּלְאָכִ֣ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>unto the messengers</n> הַבָּאִ֗ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>that came</n> כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> תֹֽאמְרוּן֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus shall ye say</n> לְאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto the men</n> יָבֵ֣ישׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n> גִּלְעָ֔ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> מָחָ֛ר <sup>4279 </sup> <n>To morrow</n> תִּהְיֶֽה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will have</n> לָכֶ֥ם תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <sup>8668 </sup> <n>ye shall have help</n> [בְּחֹם כ] (כְּחֹ֣ם <sup>2527 </sup> <n>heat</n> ק) הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>by [that time] the sun</n> וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> הַמַּלְאָכִ֗ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>And the messengers</n> וַיַּגִּ֛ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and shewed</n> לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> יָבֵ֖ישׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n> וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and they were glad</n>
10: וַֽיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>582 </sup> <n>Therefore the men</n> יָבֵ֔ישׁ <sup>3003 </sup> <n>of Jabesh</n> מָחָ֖ר <sup>4279 </sup> <n>To morrow</n> נֵצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>we will come out</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto you and ye shall do</n> לָּ֔נוּ כְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whatever</n> הַטּ֖וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>with us all that seemeth</n> ס
11: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <sup>4283 </sup> <n>And it was [so] on the morrow</n> וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>put</n> שָׁא֣וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>that Saul</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָם֮ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>in three</n> רָאשִׁים֒ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>companies</n> וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and they came</n> בְתוֹךְ־ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>into the midst</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the host</n> בְּאַשְׁמֹ֣רֶת <sup>821 </sup> <n>watch</n> הַבֹּ֔קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> וַיַּכּ֥וּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and slew</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>the Ammonites</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> חֹ֣ם <sup>2527 </sup> <n>until the heat</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>of the day</n> וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>and it came to pass that they which remained</n> וַיָּפֻ֔צוּ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>were scattered</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>of them were not left</n> בָ֖ם שְׁנַ֥יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>so that two</n> יָֽחַד׃ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n>
12: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And the people</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <sup>8050 </sup> <n>unto Samuel</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הָאֹמֵ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Who [is] he that said</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Shall Saul</n> יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>reign</n> עָלֵ֑ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> תְּנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>over us? bring</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> וּנְמִיתֵֽם׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that we may put them to death</n>
13: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יוּמַ֥ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>There shall not a man</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הַיּ֛וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for to day</n> עָשָֽׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>hath wrought</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <sup>8668 </sup> <n>salvation</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> ס
14: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <sup>8050 </sup> <n>Samuel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to the people</n> לְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> וְנֵלְכָ֣ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>to Gilgal</n> וּנְחַדֵּ֥שׁ <sup>2318 </sup> <n>and renew</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <sup>4410 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n>
15: וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And all the people</n> הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>to Gilgal</n> וַיַּמְלִכוּ֩ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>king</n> שָׁ֨ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שָׁא֜וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>and there they made Saul</n> לִפְנֵ֤י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>in Gilgal</n> וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>and there they sacrificed</n> שָׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> זְבָחִ֥ים <sup>2077 </sup> <n>sacrifices</n> שְׁלָמִ֖ים <sup>8002 </sup> <n>of peace offerings</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַיִּשְׂמַ֨ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>rejoiced</n> שָׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> שָׁא֛וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>and there Saul</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n> פ
